title: Border Dogs
description: Sent to Southern Arizona to investigate rumors of chupacabra running rampant, SEAL Team 666 becomes embroiled in Mexican cartel politics, the loss of one of their own, and the machinations of an American patriot group who wants to lock down the border at any cost. At the publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management software (DRM) applied.
author: Weston Ochse
